form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Bank of America Letter to American Consulate Mexico City,, Form Number: 12316 Washington Boulevard - Los Angeles, California 90066.

full_text: creened by NARA, 5/10/202 B BANK OF AMERICA WASHINGTON-CENTINELLA OFFICE February 22, 1978 American Consulate Mexico City Gentlemen: Our customer, Roberto B Valle, has asked us to give you the folloring information regarding his account here with our office. Roberto B Valle has maintained his account with our office since 1976. The present balance in his savings account is $1080.64, as of todays date. Sincerely, G Angie Picchi P.p Manager AP/SW BANK OF AMERICA NATIONAL TRUST AND SAVINGS ASSOCIATION 12316 WASHINGTON BOULEVARD . LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA 90066
